heroTitle1: Reuniting you with your lost items.
heroSubtitle: Our platform connects individuals and businesses to help you find what you've lost, faster.
feature1Desc: Search our extensive database for lost and found items worldwide.
feature2Desc: Create detailed reports with images and descriptions to increase your chances of finding your item.
feature3Desc: We partner with businesses to streamline their lost and found process.
benefit3: Trusted by a global community of users and partners
successQuote: I lost my camera on vacation, and I thought it was gone forever. Thanks to FindItNow, I was reunited with it in just two days!
downloadSubtitle: Get the full experience. Download our app.
faqLink3: What if my item is not found?
faqLink4: How do I claim a found item?
testimonialsSubtitle: Real stories from people we've helped.
footerReuniting: Reuniting what's lost with who's found.
faqSubtitle: Have a question? We're here to help.
faq1Content: FindItNow is a platform that connects people who have lost items with those who have found them. Users can post detailed reports of lost or found items, and our system helps match them. You can browse listings, receive notifications, and communicate securely to arrange a return.
faq2Content: Yes, your privacy is our priority. We facilitate anonymous communication between users. Your contact details are only shared when you explicitly agree to it during the claim process. We do not sell your data.
faq3Title: What if my item is not found?
faq3Content: We recommend keeping your listing active and checking back regularly. We also partner with local businesses and authorities to expand our network. While we cannot guarantee every item will be found, our platform significantly increases the chances.
faq4Title: How do I claim a found item?
faq4Content: If you believe a listed found item is yours, you can submit a claim through the item's page. You will be asked to provide specific details or proof of ownership to verify your claim with the finder. The finder will then be notified and can arrange the return with you.
faq5Content: Absolutely! We offer a dedicated partner program for businesses like airports, hotels, and malls to manage their lost and found inventory efficiently. This helps them save time and provide better service to their customers.
faq6Content: Yes, for individual users, creating an account, reporting items, and browsing listings is completely free. We want to make it as easy as possible for everyone to find their lost belongings.
contactSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have a question, feedback, or need assistance, our team is ready to help.
contactFormDesc: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contactToastSuccessDesc: Thank you for contacting us. We'll be in touch shortly.
contactToastErrorDesc: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.
contactInfoDesc: For direct inquiries, you can reach us via:
contactFollowDesc: Stay connected with us on social media.
hiwSubtitle: A simple, four-step process to find what you're looking for.
hiwStep1Desc: Search our database of lost and found items. Filter by category, location, and date to narrow your search.
hiwStep2Desc: Provide details, upload photos, and mark the location where the item was lost or found to create a clear listing.
hiwStep3Desc: Our AI-powered system works to find potential matches. We'll notify you when a likely match is found.
hiwStep4Desc: Communicate securely and anonymously with the finder or owner to verify the item and arrange a happy reunion.
privacyIntroContent: Welcome to FindItNow. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share information about you when you use our services.
privacyInfoCollectContent1: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, report an item, or communicate with other users. This may include your name, email address, and any details you provide about the items.
privacyInfoCollectContent2: We do not store sensitive personal data beyond what is necessary for the functioning of the service. Communication between users is anonymized until both parties agree to share contact information.
privacyInfoUseContent: We use the information we collect to operate and improve our services, facilitate matches between lost and found items, and communicate with you about your account and potential matches.
privacyInfoShareContent: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as necessary to provide our services (e.g., with a user who has found your item, after your consent) or as required by law.
privacyInfoKeepContent: We store your information for as long as your account is active. You can delete your account and associated data at any time.
privacyInfoSafeContent: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access.
privacyMinorsContent: Our service is not directed to individuals under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
privacyRightsContent: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time through your account settings.
termsAgreementContent: By using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use our services.
termsServiceDescContent: FindItNow provides a platform to help users report and find lost and found items. We are a neutral facilitator and are not involved in the actual exchange of items.
termsUserConductContent: You agree not to use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You are responsible for your conduct and any content you provide.
termsDisclaimersContent: The service is provided 'as is' without any warranties. We do not guarantee that any item will be found or returned.
termsLiabilityContent: FindItNow will not be liable for any incidental, special, exemplary, or consequential damages, or for any loss of property or emotional distress arising out of or in connection with these Terms or the use of the service.
termsGoverningLawContent: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is based, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
loginSubtitle: Enter your email below to login to your account.
signupSubtitle: Enter your email and password below to create your account
forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
reportFormLostDesc: Provide as much detail as possible to help us find your item.
reportFormFoundDesc: Thank you for helping reunite someone with their belongings.
reportFormDescPlaceholder: Provide a detailed description of the item, including any unique features.
reportFormLocationPlaceholder: e.g., Central Park, near the fountain
reportFormContactEmailDescAuth: This is tied to your account.
reportFormContactEmailDescNew: We'll use this to notify you. An account will be created for you.
reportFormContactEmailDescExisting: This email is already associated with an account.
reportFormImageDescNew: A clear photo greatly increases the chance of a match.
reportFormImageDescExisting: Upload a new image to replace the current one.
reportFormEditDesc: Update the details of your item report below.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters.
validation.subjectMin: Subject must be at least 5 characters.
validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters.
validation.itemNameMin: Item name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.descriptionMin: Description must be at least 10 characters.
validation.locationMin: Location must be at least 3 characters.
validation.proofMin: Please provide at least 20 characters of proof.
validation.storyMin: Your story must be at least 10 characters.

browseSubtitle: Look through the latest lost and found reports from our community.
browseSearchPlaceholder: Search by name, description, or location...
browseNoItemsDesc: Your search didn't match any items. Try adjusting your filters.
browseItemNotFoundDesc: The item you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.
itemResolvedDesc: This item has been successfully resolved and is no longer open for claims.
isThisYourItemDesc: To claim this item, please provide verifiable proof of ownership below. The finder will be notified and can arrange a return with you.
claimFormProofPlaceholder: Describe the item in detail. Mention any unique scratches, contents of the bag/wallet, or the phone's lock screen image.
haveYouFoundThisDesc: If you think you've found this item, please send a message to the owner. Fill out the form below to connect with them.
foundFormLocationFoundPlaceholder: e.g., On a bench at Union Square
foundFormDefaultMessage: I believe I have found your {itemName}. Please describe it to confirm.
accountSubtitle: Manage your submissions and personal information.
accountNoSubmissions: You haven't submitted any items yet.
accountNoSubmissionsDesc: When you report a lost or found item, it will appear here.
accountDeleteItemDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your item listing.
enquiriesSubtitle: Respond to people who have found your items or are claiming items you've found.
enquiriesNoEnquiriesDesc: When someone messages you about an item, you'll see it here.
feedbackDesc: We're so glad you were reunited with your {itemName}! Please take a moment to share your experience.
feedbackStoryPlaceholder: Tell us how FindItNow helped you...
feedbackDefaultStory: I was so relieved to find my {itemName}! The process was simple and I was able to connect with the other person quickly. Thank you FindItNow!
feedbackToastSuccessDesc: Your feedback has been submitted and will help others.
feedbackToastErrorDesc: There was an error submitting your feedback. Please try again.
partnerRegisterSubtitle: Join our network of businesses to manage lost and found items efficiently.
partnerDashboardSubtitle: Welcome to your partner dashboard. Here you can manage found items and claims.
partnerItemsTotal: Total items you've logged as found.
partnerRecentItemsDesc: Here are the latest items your organization has reported.
servicesSubtitle: Tailored solutions to help individuals and businesses recover what matters.
servicesIndividualDesc: Free and easy-to-use tools for everyone.
servicesBusinessFeat2: Partner dashboard to track items and claims
servicesReadyDesc: Whether you've lost something or you're a business that wants to help, we have the tools for you.
aboutSubtitle: We connect good intentions with smart technology to bring lost items back home.
aboutMissionDesc: Our mission is simple: to create a centralized, trusted, and efficient platform to bridge the gap between a lost item and its reunion with the rightful owner. We believe that a small act of honesty, amplified by technology, can make a huge difference in someone's day.
aboutValues1Desc: We foster a community built on trust and honesty.
aboutValues2Desc: We understand the stress of losing something valuable.
aboutValues3Desc: We leverage technology to simplify the reunion process.
aboutJoinDesc: Whether you've lost an item, found one, or are a business looking to improve your lost-and-found process, we're here to help. Together, we can make more reunions happen.
